attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need a new prime minister. He only won the recent 40-day police vote for holding terrorists without trial because he bribed MPs, notably those from the democratic unionist party. He has no support from his own party - its time to step down and let someone take over who can actually do their job

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
